price: As for those who reject Our signs, We will gradually lead them to destruction[83] without them realizing it.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا سَنَسۡتَدۡرِجُهُم مِّنۡ حَيۡثُ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ
footnotes: [83] By giving them one favor after another which only increases them in arrogance and sin.
